text: the last 24 hours of my life have felt
like a dream
[Music]
spontaneous eye-opening thrilling here's
what happened months ago this Ethiopian
Airlines plane I flew from Bangkok to
Madagascar
16 hours of travel via Ethiopia when I
arrived in the morning I was picked up
by four people about my age Halle Dave
Nancy and Antonio I got connected with
them through Facebook and they kindly
agreed to show me around for a few days
so right now I didn't have a clue what
we'd be doing where I'd be sleeping or
what to expect from Madagascar's capital
of Antananarivo but isn't that the fun
part about traveling sometimes I put
myself in these situations on purpose to
think to observe to feel this was one of
those times all right we're getting some
street food here on the side of the road
after all it's my sixth trip to Africa I
was more ready than ever for an
adventure my first impressions of
Antananarivo were lots of colonial
buildings old school taxis interesting
street food extreme poverty kids playing
soccer
adults betting on fights and a
slightly dangerous overall feeling on
the streets my friend Ali kept freaking
out whenever I was in public with my
camera she thought I was gonna get
jumped why you so scared
also it's jacket weather here which I
clearly didn't come prepared in my brain
August always means hot but this is
winter in the southern hemisphere and
evenings here dropped down to the 40's
Wi-Fi is almost non-existent
I wanted to text my parents and
girlfriend that I arrived safely but it
ended up being an all-day journey to get
Internet we tried restaurants cafes and
even hot spots but nothing worked
finally we found this tiny internet cafe
and I barely got a signal by early
evening we headed to Dave's family's
house 15 K outside the city they took
off my shirt they happily welcomed me
inside and cooked me a delicious dinner
of this mixed rice and vegetable dish
caught vari Amin Anna they even gave me
a nice room to sleep in I was very happy
as I laid there trying to fall asleep I
just smiled as I realized that this is
the reason why I travelled for
experiences that make me feel alive
present and happy this is how life is
supposed to be lived
I'm Drew Pinsky and if you like my
travel videos please click Subscribe and
join me as I plan to visit every country
in the world
